question_sentence: Amazon boss Jeff Bezos’s​ phone was reportedly hacked via a WhatsApp video file sent from a number belonging to which world leader?
In which two countries did Reddit users line up pieces of bread on exact opposite sides of the planet to create an “Earth sandwich”?
Why did the US National Weather Service this week warn that iguanas may fall from trees in Florida?
choices: The reptiles are dying from a lethal bacterial disease
They’re falling asleep owing to unseasonably warm weather
They’re frozen solid following unseasonably cold weather
They keep pushing each other off their perches

question_sentence: What did Donald Trump call climate crisis activists during a speech at the World Economic Forum in Davos?
How many additional staff is social media giant Facebook planning to hire in London this year?
New figures show that the homicide rate in Mexico hit a record high in 2019 - how many people on average were killed each day?
What is the name of the BBC director general who has announced he is standing down after seven years in the role?
Beales entered administration this week, putting at risk jobs at the department store chain’s how many UK outlets?
What is a US company going to attempt to retrieve from the Titanic in a controversial salvage operation?
choices: The radio that relayed the sinking ship’s final plea for help

question_sentence: Which fashion brand has been accused of cultural appropriation after sending models wearing cornrow wigs down the catwalk at Paris Fashion Week?

China is battling to contain a highly infectious coronavirus that has killed at least 17 people and sickened hundreds. At least one case has been diagnosed in the US. In what animal do scientists and authorities think this virus originated?
evidence: Scientists believe the virus was first transmitted to humans via two species of venomous snakes sold in some traditional Chinese markets.

question_sentence: The New York Times made history this week by endorsing these two Democratic presidential candidates.
evidence: The New York times endorsed the two remaining major female candidates; Elizabeth Warren and Amy Klobuchar.

question_sentence: Which country finally formed a new government after the former prime minister stepped down in October amid ongoing protests over government corruption and economic hardship?
evidence: Hassan Diab, a former professor, was named Lebanon’s new prime minister. Diab will choose a new cabinet and attempt to move the country forward from months of unrest.

question_sentence: Which two teams will play in this year’s Super Bowl?
choices: The San Francisco 49ers and the Kansas City Chiefs
The Green Bay Packers and the Kansas City Chiefs
The New England Patriots and the Green Bay Packers
The Baltimore Ravens and the San Francisco 49ers
evidence: The San Francisco 49ers and the Kansas City Chiefs will meet in Super Bowl LIV in Miami.

question_sentence: Protesters in Puerto Rico are demanding the resignation of Governor Wanda Vázquez after the what controversial discovery?
choices: A warehouse full of hurricane relief supplies
A secret deal with an electrical company
evidence: Vázquez fired several members of her cabinet after the discovery of a warehouse filled with supplies meant to be distributed after Hurricane Maria in 2017. Now, protesters want her ousted, too.

question_sentence: Which popular fast food chain filed for bankruptcy this week?
evidence: Krystal said stiff competition and changing consumer tastes contributed to the chain’s decision.

question_sentence: Chief Justice John Roberts had to scold both sides during preliminary procedures in this week’s impeachment trial. He used an unusual word while doing so: Pettifogging. What does it mean?
choices: Stalling to keep something from happening
evidence: Pettifogging means “worrying too much about details that are minor or not important." Roberts used the word to refer to a complaint made during a 1905 trial. He was trying to say that people used to hold others to a higher standard of trial conduct, and so should the participants of the impeachment trial.

question_sentence: Prince Harry and Meghan Markle are settling into their new home in what country?
evidence: Markle lived in Canada for seven years prior to meeting Prince Harry, and the pair say they have a strong connection to the country.

question_sentence: President Trump traveled to Davos, Switzerland this week to participate in what important global gathering?
evidence: This year’s World Economic Forum focused on the climate crisis. In an address at the forum, Trump touted the strength of the American economy and urged optimism over a specific climate crisis action plan.

question_sentence: Social media is mourning the apparent death of what legendary brand mascot?
evidence: Planters announced the death of their 104-year-old mascot as part of their Super Bowl marketing plan. Mourners are urged to tune into the Super Bowl to get the full story on what happened to the beloved legume.
